snippet.title: Angels Lullaby Intro
snippet.description:
The legends of old were once new.

A golden hearted wish to come true.

Tonight, they call onto the sky,

This is their Angel's Lullaby,

A song sung just for You.
-
Angel's Lullaby is an ambitious fangame prequel to the hit indie game UNDERTALE, with elements and connections to DELTARUNE.

Angel's takes place during the game's opening introduction, back during the Human and Monster War. Expanding on the lore, meta narrative and core themes of the original games, Angel's aims to enrich the Undertale world by mixing both the old and new.

Combining both an open-world and linear story-line, Angel's is an ambitious fangame with a large story to tell. There's three main "Acts," each with it's own main area that follows a story.

-
gamejolt page: https://gamejolt.com/games/Angels-Lullaby/352676

itch.io: https://starlightshore.itch.io/angels-lullaby

Game made by starlightshore

Music composed by https://potato-arts.tumblr.com/
Opening theme mixed by Augie Bello ( @augie_bello on instagram)

(lets-plays are allowed, but please keep opening credits up and keep the video demonetized. thank you. oh also, please link me so I can see it, that sounds wonderful.)

Made in GameMaker, aesprite

Made in the UNDERTALE Engine by TML, which is owned by Jevilhumor
With additional hope from our team (Not yet Named)
